Class WarJarTagLibrary

java.lang.Object
io.github.weblegacy.tlddoc.WarJarTagLibrary
All Implemented Interfaces:
TagLibrary, Closeable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JarTldFileTagLibrary, WarJarTldFileTagLibrary, WarTagDirImplicitTagLibrary
public class WarJarTagLibrary extends Object implements TagLibrary
Base class for a WAR/JAR container-file.
Author:
ste-gr

    • getTldDocument

      public Document getTldDocument(DocumentBuilder documentBuilder) throws IOException, SAXException, TransformerFactoryConfigurationError, TransformerException
      Returns a Document of the effective tag library descriptor for this tag library. This might come from a file or be implicitly generated.
      Specified by:
      getTldDocument in interface TagLibrary
      Parameters:
      documentBuilder - DocumentBuilder to obtain DOM Document for creating an XML-document.
      Returns:
      created XML-Document
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error has occurred
      SAXException - If any parse errors occur.
      TransformerFactoryConfigurationError - Thrown in case of service configuration error or if the implementation is not available or cannot be instantiated.
      TransformerException - If an unrecoverable error occurs during the course of the transformation.
